alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Caldwell, southern Hays, north central Guadalupe and central Comal Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Marcos, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Kyle, Wimberley, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Woodcreek, Martindale, Uhland, Staples, Fischer, Spring Branch, Zorn, Smithson Valley, Hunter, San Marcos Regional Airport, Startzville, Maxwell, Reedville and Sattler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
